definitions.title: n.
definitions.body: [[אהבה]] infr.; Pt. [[אׂהֵב]] ([[אוֹהֵב]]) De 10:18 + 26 t.; f. cstr. [[אֲהֻבַת]] Ho 3:1 is prob. active cf. Ba:NB 174 ff; sf. [[אׂהֲבִי]] Is 41:8 etc.; f. [[אׂהֶ֫בֶת]] Ge 25:28; [[אׂהַ֫בְתִּי]] Ho 10:11 etc.; Pt. pass. [[אָהוּב]] Ne 13:26; [[אֲהוּבָה]] De 21:15, De 21:15, De 21:16.—love (mostly c. acc., sq. [[לְ]] + obj. Le 19:18, Le 19:34, 2Ch 19:2 (late), sq. [[בְּ]] Ec 5:9; abs. Ec 3:8 & v.infr.), (affection both pure & impure, divine & human);—

human love to human object; abs., opp. hate [[שָׂנֵא]] Ec 3:8; of love to son Ge 22:2, Ge 25:28, Ge 37:3, Ge 37:4, Ge 44:20 (JE) Pr 13:24; so also 2Sa 13:21 LXX Ew Th We, cf. Dr, of Dvd's loving Amnon; never to parent, but mother-in-law Ru 4:15; of man's love to woman; wife Ge 24:67, Ge 29:20, Ge 29:30 (cf. v:Ge 29:18):Ge 29:32 (JE), also De 21:15, De 21:15, De 21:16, Ju Jdg 14:16, 1Sa 1:5, 2Ch 11:21, Es 2:17, Ho 3:1, Ec 9:9; but also Ge 34:3 (J) Ju Jdg 16:4, Jdg 16:15, 2Sa 13:1, 2Sa 13:4, 2Sa 13:15 (where of carnal desire) 1Ki 11:1 cf. v:1Ki 11:2 Ho 3:1; [[רֵעַ]] ´[[א]] loving a paramour, v. Ba:NB 176; woman's love to man 1Sa 18:20 (so v:1Sa 18:28 MT, but rd. [[וְבִי כָל־יִשְׂרָאֵל אׂהֵב אׂתוֹ]] LXX We Dr) Ct So 1:3, So 1:4, So 1:7, So 3:1, So 3:2, So 3:3, So 3:4 (5 t. subj. [[נַפְשִׁי]]); cf. also fig. of adulterous Judah Je 2:25, Is 57:8, Ez Eze 16:37; of love of slave to master Ex 21:5 (JE) De 15:16; inferior to superior 1Sa 18:22 cf. v:1Sa 18:16; love to neighbour Le 19:18 ([[וְאָהַבְתָּ לְרֵעֲךָ כָּמוָֹךָ]]), partic to stranger Le 19:34 (both P), De 10:18, De 10:19; love of friend to friend 1Sa 16:21, 1Sa 18:1, 1Sa 18:3, 1Sa 20:17, 1Sa 20:17, Job 19:19, Pr 17:1 cf. 2Sa 19:7, 2Sa 19:7, 2Ch 19:2; v. also Pr 9:8, Pr 16:13 cf. Pr 15:12; v. esp. Pt. infr.

less oft. of appetite, obj. food, Ge 27:7, Ge 27:9, Ge 27:14 (JE); drink Ho 3:1, Pr 21:17; husbandry 2Ch 26:10; cf. fig. of Ephraim Ho 10:11 sq. inf.; length of life Ps 34:13; of cupidity Ho 9:1, 1Sa 1:23, Ec 5:9, Ec 5:9; of love of sleep Pr 20:13 cf. fig. of sluggish watchmen (sq. inf.) Is 56:10; also c. obj. abstr. wisdom (personif.), knowledge, righteousness, etc. Pr 4:6, Pr 8:17, Pr 8:21, Pr 12:1, Pr 22:11, Pr 29:3, Am 5:15, Mic 6:8 (inf. ‖ infinitives) Zec 8:19, cf. Pr 19:8 [[קׂנֶה לֵב אׂהֵב נַפְשׁוֹ]]; obj. folly, evil, etc., Mic 3:2, Mic 4:3, Ps 11:5, Ps 52:5, Ps 52:6, Ps 109:17, Pr 1:22, Pr 8:36, Pr 17:19, Pr 17:19, cf. Pr 18:21, Zec 8:17, cf. [[כֵּן]] ´[[א]] Am 4:5, Je 5:3, sq. Inf. Ho 12:8, Je 14:10, esp. of idolatry Ho 4:13 (where del. [[הֵבוּ]] cf. Kö:1. p. 395) Je 8:2.

love to God Ex 20:6 (JE) elsewhere Hex only De 5:10, De 6:5, De 7:9 + 9 t. Dt + Jos 22:5, Jos 23:11; also Ju Jdg 5:31, 1Ki 3:3, Ne 1:5, Da 9:4; esp. in (late) Ps 31:24, Ps 116:1, Ps 145:20, but usually sq. name, law, etc. of ´[[י]] Ps 5:12, Ps 26:8, Ps 40:17, Ps 69:37, Ps 70:5, Ps 97:10, Ps 119:47 + 11 t. Ps 119; cf. 1Sa 56:6; cf. also of love to Jerusalem 1Sa 66:10 Ps 122:6.

esp. Pt. [[אׂהֵב]] = (a) lover, La 1:2 (fig. of Jerus.); (b) friend Hiram of David 1Ki 5:15, cf. Je 20:4, Je 20:6, Es 5:10, Es 5:14, Es 6:13, Ps 38:12 (‖[[רֵעַ]]) so Ps 88:18, & Pr 14:20; also Pr 18:24, Pr 27:6; Abr. of God 1Sa 41:8, 2Ch 20:7.

of divine love (a) to individual men De 4:37, 2Sa 12:24, Pr 3:12, Pr 15:9, Ps 146:8, Ne 13:26; (b) to people Israel, etc. De 7:8, De 7:13, De 23:6, Ho 3:1, Ho 9:15, Ho 11:1, Ho 14:5, 1Ki 10:9, 2Ch 2:10, 2Ch 9:8, Is 43:4, Is 48:14, Je 31:3, Mal 1:2, Mal 1:2, Mal 1:2, Ps 47:5; to Jerusalem Ps 78:68, Ps 87:2; (c) to righteousness, etc. Ps 11:7, Ps 33:5, Ps 37:28, Ps 45:8, Ps 99:4, Is 61:8, Mal 2:11. †

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Pt. pl. [[הַנֶּאֱהָבִים]] 2Sa 1:23 lovely, loveable of Saul & Jonath. (‖[[הַנְּעִימִם]]). †
lovers in fig. of adulter. Isr. Ho 2:7, Ho 2:9, Ho 2:12, Ho 2:14, Ho 2:15, Ez Eze 23:5, Eze 23:9; Judah Je 22:20, Je 22:22, Je 30:14, La 1:19, Ez Eze 16:33, Eze 16:36, Eze 16:37, Eze 23:22.
